body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia        Big country for a lone hiker. NPS Photo/Nyssa Landres            A Picture's Worth a Thousand Words Not many people get the chance to see Noatak National Preserve in person, so we've taken the old adage to heart and created photo galleries of Noatak's animals, plants and vistas so that everyone can experience their splendor.           Lights, Camera, Action! Noatak National Preserve is full of sweeping vistas and dynamic scenery that can't always be adequately captured by photographs. Check out these NPS produced videos to see the Noatak River Basin in action and tag along for a peek at some of our Junior Ranger programs.      Blogs Blogs are a great way to stay up-to-date on what's happening in your national park.  Written by park rangers and researchers, our blogs share the latest research and activities going on in Noatak National Preserve.
